resources.string: "Quest\'applicazione non è supportata su Android 4.4 o superiore"
"This application is not supported on Android 2.2 Version"
"%1$s app is compatible with android OS version 4.0 and above."
"Il file registrato non è stato allegato."
"Orientamento bloccato!! Non è possibile modificare l\'orientamento del dispositivo mentre si annota un report."
"Non può importare le connessioni in modalità offline"
"Hierarchy operation is not supported for personal view documents"
"Report element linking operation is not supported for personal view documents"
"Open document URL operation is not supported for personal view documents"
"Specify a different name; the name already exists for a different personal view"
"Impossibile elaborare la richiesta; riprova più tardi."
"Operation cannot be performed; download is in progress"
"Il tipo di documento selezionato è sconosciuto."
"Il nome di questa connessione esiste già"
"Il documento non è attribuito ad alcuna categoria mobile"
"Download del documento su Home in corso..."
"Il documento di collegamento è incompatibile con l\'applicazione attuale e non può essere visualizzato"
"Download e aggiunta del documento a Home in corso..."

"No connections defined.
 
To create new connection go to: 
Menu > Settings > Connections"
"Rete non disponibile; vuoi lavorare in modalità offline?"
"Rete disponibile; vuoi lavorare in modalità online?"
"Per accedere al contenuto in modalità offline, esegui il login al server per la prima volta"
"Do you want to delete the selected connection: %1$s ?"
"Impossibile eliminare la connessione; logout e riprovare"
"Impossibile aggiungere la connessione quando l\'utente è collegato; logout e riprovare"
"Impossibile modificare la connessione; logout e riprovare"
"Il refresh rimuoverà il contesto attuale del documento"
"Password CMS non salvata a causa delle norme di sicurezza impostate dall\'amministratore"
"Impossibile chiamare la lista di valori dal server; contattare l\'amministratore se il problema persiste"
"Tutti i prompt obbligatori non sono inseriti"
"Per eseguire quest\'azione è necessaria una connessione attiva"
"The document information is not available. Currently there might not be an active connection available or document is not present in mobile category."
"The document cannot be saved. Currently there might not be an active connection available or document is not present in mobile category."
"Impossibile salvare il documento. Si è verificato un errore generico"
"Space insufficient for saving; create space by deleting existing personal views or increase the storage capacity using Settings."
"The selected certificate may be invalid or corrupt.What would you like to do?"
"No Certificates installed for SAP BusinessObjects Mobile.What would you like to do?"
"How would you sign into the connection"
"Welcome to ""SAP BusinessObjects Mobile"". This quick hints wizard help you to understand how to interact with the application."
"Long press"" on the required document to access context menu. ""Tap"" on the option to perform the desired action."
"Tap"" on the page indicator to view the page navigation slider. On a smartphone, you can also use the seek bar for this."
"Double tap"" on a chart or ""Tap"" on table (with text in blue) to perform drill."
"Double tap"" on the table column header to access ""Table Actions""."
"Tap"" on the icon to perform desired action on the report part."
"Select ""Table Actions"" to perform tasks such as Reorder, Freeze/Unfreeze or Hide/Unhide the columns or rows."
"Tap"" on the ""Sections"" icon to access the section options available on the report."
"On the ""Sections"" pop over, ""Tap"" on radio button to view the section information of the report or ""Tap"" on the arrow to view next level information of the report."
"Tap"" on ""Share"" icon and Select ""Annotation"" to annotate the report before sharing."
"Drag"" the Blur slider to distort the report before sharing."
"Tap"" on each Point Of Interests (POIs) to view the associated value."
"Tap"" on the value to view detailed information."
"Tap"" on the arrow to navigate through the hierarchical data of the table."
"In the Prompts Hierarchy pop over, ""tap"" on the arrow to navigate through the hierarchy to select the prompt value(s)."
"Tap"" on the ""Show/Hide"" icon to access the Action Bar while viewing a Dashboard."
"Tap"" on the ""Pin"" icon to lock the Action Bar when viewing a Dashboard."
"Stabilisci la connessione per eseguire il download dei documenti"
"Modifica i valori sopra indicati solo se hai ricevuto istruzioni dall\'amministratore"
"Errore nell\'analisi sintattica della risposta dal server"
"Il tipo di oggetto non è supportato"
"Impossibile visualizzare GeoMap poiché il dispositivo non ha accesso alle librerie delle mappe"
"Impossibile visualizzare il grafico a causa di punti di dati grandi"
"Esegui il refresh per visualizzare il contenuto"
"You must set an application password to establish BI platform connection. Using the password you can secure your offline data. \n\nDo you want to continue?"

"Resetting the application will delete all local data, including connection details and application settings. You can access the application after reset without using application password.\n\nDo you want to proceed to reset the application?"

"You have entered incorrect application password 9 times. If you enter incorrect password next time, the application will reset and the local data, including connection details and settings will be lost.\n\nTo access the application after reset, establish a new connection and enter a valid application password."
"You have entered the wrong password %1$d times. \n\nDo you want to reset the application?"
"Tocca per aprire il report nel browser"
"Tap to add a connection in the SAP BI application in Android"
"Tap to add a connection in the SAP BI application in iOS"
"Nota: per avviare questo file audio, accertati di aver scaricato i codec più recenti per il media player disponibile"
"Tap to open the report in the SAP BI application in Android device"
"Tap to open the report in the SAP BI application in iOS device"
"Impossibile scaricare questo documento a causa delle norme configurate per la sicurezza ampliata"
"You will be navigated back to the Home Screen"
"Impossibile eseguire il backup del documento. Ritentare successivamente"
"Si è verificato un errore durante la chiamata del token di richiesta dal server SAP JAM"
"Si è verificato un errore durante la chiamata del token di accesso dal server SAP JAM"
"Errore durante il reperimento dei gruppi dal server SAP JAM"
"Gruppo con lo stesso nome già esistente"
"Errore durante l\'upload dello screenshot sul server SAP JAM"
"Dettagli OAUTH non validi. Configura i dettagli OAUTH esatti in CMS"
"This connection may be untrusted. Do you want to proceed?"
"An external program wants to delete a connection. Do you want to proceed?"
"An external program wants to modify a connection. Do you want to proceed?"
"Category name already exists;enter a different name for the category."
"Category name is empty;enter a different name for the category."
"Are you sure you want to delete the category"
"Auto-Update is not available for this connection"
"Use Show only downloaded reports option to see all documents that are added to device."
"Save document as a personal view to retain all the analytical actions and view them in offline."
"Notification badge shows alerts if modified document or a new instance is available in the server."
"Notification panel enables you to manage document updates conveniently."
"Display categories as flat list or as nested structure."
"BI Inbox documents can be downloaded on to the device, and marked as read OR unread."
"You can view and interact with SAP Business Objects Analysis Application."
"To access your BI content, create a new connection using one of the available connection types."
"Tap on each Point of Interest (POI) to view the detailed information of the associated values."
"Customize the font style of the Table cell to Bold, Italics or Underline."
"Tap on the Micro bar chart, to view the chart in zoom mode."
"Toggle between Group by and sort options help to organize the document listing conveniently."
"Use Auto-Update settings to automatically update all offline documents on availability of Wi-Fi."
"Configure default filter value in the Geo Analysis document."
"You can Share document link through e-mail, retaining current navigation context."
"Viewer unavailable; install a PDF Viewer to view the document"
"The date of the certificate is invalid"
